title: "IBM Nears $5 Billion Deal for Software Provider"
excerpt: "In April, IBM reported first-quarter revenue of $14.3 billion, up slightly from the prior year. It booked software revenue of $5.9 billion, up 2.6% year-over-year. Its other segments are consulting, infrastructure and financing, the smallest division by revenue."
